lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 1 -- Senator Clark of Missouri asked Secretary Knox about the status of Colonel William Donovan, now in Europe as an observer, during the hearing of the Foreign Relations Committee today.
abstract: Sec Knox says Donovan travels as private citizen at own expense, Sen com hearing
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 1 -- Senator Clark of Missouri asked Secretary Knox about the status of Colonel William Donovan, now in Europe as an observer, during the hearing of the Foreign Relations Committee today....
